---
name: 友链模板
about: 请根据指示规范填写友链格式。
---

<!-- 请在下方代码块的双引号中填写 -->
\```json
{
    "title": "",
    "screenshot": "",
    "url": "",
    "avatar": "",
    "description": "",
    "keywords": ""
}
\```

<!--
"title": "站点名称",
"screenshot": "站点预览图链接",
"url": "站点链接",
"avatar": "头像链接",
"description": "站点描述",
"keywords": "关键词，作为分组名"
-->

<!-- 示例 -->

<!--
"title": "Akilarの糖果屋",
"screenshot": "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Akilarlxh/ScreenShot@gh-pages/akilar.top.jpg",
"url": "https://akilar.top/",
"avatar": "/img/siteicon/favicon.png",
"description": "期待您的光临！",
"keywords": "糖果屋"
-->
